title: DRL-STNet: Unsupervised Domain Adaptation for Cross-modality Medical Image Segmentation via Disentangled Representation Learning
details: H Lin, F Schiffers, S López-Tapia, N Tavakoli, D Kim… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Unsupervised domain adaptation (UDA) is essential for medical image segmentation, especially in cross-modality data scenarios. UDA aims to transfer knowledge from a labeled source domain to an unlabeled target domain, thereby …
